PERSONAL MOVIE MANAGER © Avirup Kundu is released under the GPL.
You need Python3 and PySide.

:Help:
1-Enter a movie name or the IMDB url in the 'Movie Name' field and click 'IMDB Search'.
2-'Save' the information.
3-Select the movie name from the list and click 'Add a movie'.

Now you can 'Play Movie' from within the software anytime.
'Delete Movie' only deletes the entry from PERSONAL MOVIE MANAGER.

The 'Search' field searches for a movie currently in the database.

That's it enjoy! Report any BUGS to-->  avirupkundu@gmail.com
